fehd.SS_TC: 海底撈火鍋 - 利舞臺廣場店

result.adr_address: 99號, Percival St, Causeway Bay, Hong Kong
result.formatted_address: 99號, Percival St, Causeway Bay, Hong Kong
result.name: Lee Theatre

reviews.text: This area of Hong Kong was recently redone. The shopping area is really cute with tons of stores. It is very clean the sales people are very helpful it's a few blocks away from times square mall. It's has lots of up  scale stores they are all very nice there is multiple buildings in the Lee Theater area so check the address to make sure you are in the correct building

Large shopping mall which is part of the Lee Gardens concept. Nice and functional, but not really with to much of a soul of is own or anything else to do really than to shop and eat. Functional rather than fantastic.

Your dinning place. Lots of nice restaurants in this building. 

Lower level are clothing shops. Upper levels are all restaurants. Take the lifts to go up to the higher levels.

this is a place to visit especially if you love shopping at UNIQLO. Several floors of UNIQLO assures you way better variety and stocks. Being located in causeway bay, it is convenient to explore from one shopping mall to another since the malls are just adjacent to each other.
The once iconic landmark theater turned shopping and dining center.

result.adr_address: Hong Kong, 銅鑼灣利舞台19楼
result.formatted_address: Hong Kong, 銅鑼灣利舞台19楼
result.name: Haidilao Hot Pot - Causeway Bau

reviews.text: There’s been so much hype about this place that I went in a bit skeptical, but was so surprised at how nice this restaurant actually is. First off, it’s spotless and appears to be brand new. The decor is clean, uncluttered and modern. The staff are very helpful, quick and eager to please. The hotpot experience is best done with four people to a table, with a choice of up to four soup broths in the hotpot. The choice of food is excellent, with plenty of veg options. Don’t skip the noodle show at the end!
It situated at Lee Garden, causeway.  Very good service attitudes,  price is competitive. Free dessert and fruits.
Great service and clean hotpot place, no waiting during lunch hours weekday.  They notice I'm pregnant with extra care and at the end they give me new born baby gift and greeting card.  So sweet :)

super large portion, great soup base, fresh ingredients + free manicure, noodles stretching performance, hair band, apron, sleeve protector, phone protector (a plastic bag), candies for waiting customers, super attentive service & clean... what else do you want for a $90-ish lunch?
No 沙茶醬 was a dealbreaker for me personally 😂 and it was quite pricey for just an average hot pot. But the service was excellent!;

result.adr_address: 香港銅鑼灣利舞台19楼
result.name: 海底撈火鍋 - 銅鑼灣

reviews.text: 海底撈給我對食肆一個嶄新的體驗。首先，遇到等位時，會有一點點小食、水果和一杯水招呼你，也有抽獎遊戲玩，有機會獲得全單8折憂惠，不妨碰碰運氣。除火鍋外，有小型自助bar任食，包括雞湯、雪耳糖水、雜菇類、海藻等。這裡主打川菜火鍋，當然不少得麻辣鍋底和冬蔭功，可選少辣，也有港式湯底。新奇是可一次過揀四種鍋底，如懂得揀，是不加錢的。但食材選擇少，一般肥牛、羊、素，海鮮特別是魚類很少。喜出望外是有四川戲寶變臉表演，可近距離欣賞。如有點蝦，會有人即時幫你剝蝦殼，手法一絕！值得推介。

훠거 좋아하시면 추천!
직원들 전부 친절하시고 내부도 엄청 깔끔합니다.
한국인 커플이 찾아왔다며 무진장 잘해주셨어요.
신기한건 여기는 하이디라오에서 생일파티하는게 있는지 곳곳에 생일파티석이 있었습니다. 여행중 생일맞으신분들 가보셔도 좋을것같아요ㅎ

There’s been so much hype about this place that I went in a bit skeptical, but was so surprised at how nice this restaurant actually is. First off, it’s spotless and appears to be brand new. The decor is clean, uncluttered and modern. The staff are very helpful, quick and eager to please. The hotpot experience is best done with four people to a table, with a choice of up to four soup broths in the hotpot. The choice of food is excellent, with plenty of veg options. Don’t skip the noodle show at the end!

超貼心．火鍋

記得四年前去上海食過大陸著名品牌海底撈，之前一直未有機會再食。上年進駐香港，星期五Happy Friday 終於再回憶雨

我個人覺得香港不論服務食物比大陸毫不遜色！

門口有服務員招待取票、有餐前小食供應、有修甲服務、有生日佈置、最貼心莫過於一人火鍋有大bear bear 熊倍坐服務

餐廳地方算大，不過6點已經全埸爆滿，不過朋友一早等位

坐底侍應遞上前菜、圍裙、手機袋、毛巾，招呼貼心，特別筷子剝蝦技術令人嘆為觀止

除了調味料必有葱、蒜、醋、辣椒，還有前菜可以添加

麻辣鍋
見到花椒、指天椒及乾辣椒等十多款特色香料煮成，設有大、中、小辣，少辣味香辣平衡

番茄鍋
番茄湯味道幾濃，有新鮮番茄

極品手切肥牛腋 (小) $198
一望就知靚，鮮紅有油花而且脂肪同肉平均，輕輕煮8秒已經變色可以食用，食落肉質厚、嫩滑、重肉味帶牛油香，不論紅油定藥膳鍋，味道十分夾

太極雙滑 
蝦滑新鮮彈牙有鮮味

響鈴 
火鍋不能缺少響鈴，響鈴酥脆，滾幾秒吸番茄湯非常美味

西班牙黑毛豬豚肉 
豚肉一望就知新鮮，肉質帶鮮紅有油花而且脂肪同肉平均，食落肉質厚、嫩滑、重肉味

活蝦
蝦新鮮彈牙，重點有人用筷子剝蝦技術令人嘆為觀止

撈派豆花
豆花比較鬆軟，比平日豆腐質地比較吸湯，加上特秘醬，非常美味

撈麵
去到海底撈一定會叫撈麵，有師傅特別過黎表現拉麵玩花式，除左貼心服務，拉麵亦係全晚高潮位

最後，有水果同雪糕糯米慈作飯後甜品

有貼心服務，有美味火鍋，有修甲，有娛樂，唔需要返大陸都享受到！
It situated at Lee Garden, causeway.  Very good service attitudes,  price is competitive. Free dessert and fruits.
